entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
